attributes.title: ⚠️Bad vibe check, don’t download⚠️😒😤
attributes.review: This app is just HORRIBLE Idk why it was made super hard to use and it just makes me wanna throw up, terrible I’m deleting this trash 🤮😤 totally ruins the mood. I’m mean it’s just about a Cheetos-puff lookin child molester. He’s racist and bringing the “GREAT USA” to its lowest, isn’t this country supposed to be free, I don’t see any here🙄🙄

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review:
I downloaded the app and was met with the face of a racist pedo named Donald trump, I am completely traumatized by the irky orange glow to his face. He is not human. I think he’s a Cheeto. I started crying because of how DISGUSTANG he is.. This app is a threat to society and should be removed RIGHT NOWWW👹👹😭😭

Justice for George Floyd and every other person of the black community harmed by the government and police ways

attributes.title: This app has been causing my phone to glitch
attributes.review: Ever since downloading this app my phone has been glitching and I’m concerned about my privacy. I input my phone number in the app but I think it was stolen and sold because I’ve been receiving calls from tons of scammers.

attributes.title: SCAM
attributes.review: i downloaded the app because as an arabic woman ik donald supports me NO MATTER WHAT. but i was met with a notification as soon as i installed it. it said 'allow information to be retrieved?' and i said DONT ALLOW and a notification popped up that said ' WE DONT CARE' and they proceeded to take all my information. IM BEING DEADLY SERIOUS WHEN I SAY THIS. DONT DOWNLOAD THE APP THEY WILL SCAM YOU AND USE UR INFORMATION AGAINST YOU!!!!

attributes.title: My iPhone overheated and burnt my hand!
attributes.review: When the app finally downloaded after 5 days. I tried to open it but it just showed a blank screen with a 404 error message and my phone started to heat up until my hand was burnt to the second degree!!! Don’t Get!!!!!

attributes.title: Terrible Quality
attributes.review: This app glitches so much. When I open it, it takes forever to load, and then, when it finally does, the screen goes black and I can’t access anything else unless I restart the device.

attributes.title: DATA COLLECTION APP
attributes.review: I cannot believe it! He’s created an app for people to log in, enter personal information, and gives you rewards for the more information you share. It’s data mining just like he claims he’s against! This is beyond messed up. He’s trying to undermine his demographic and it’s SAD!

attributes.title: Definitely is tracking me
attributes.review: I only keep one app on my phone - the phone app. I only downloaded this because of my love for our comrade Donald J. Trump. However, I still don’t trust this app and I am sure it is tracking my movements as storing my data. I have since deleted it.

attributes.title: Polly..y_3
attributes.review: This app has caused nothing but problems, it took over 2 weeks to download and is now messing with my apps. If I could I’d rate this app ZERO STARS. It has now created some type of virus, I’ve tried to uninstall it but it logs me onto pictures of Trumps NAKED ABSURD BODY. To say the least this app is a COMPLETE WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY, and now I need to schedule THERAPY SESSIONS FOR LIFE.

attributes.title: Triggered me
attributes.review: I thought the worst day of my life was when I almost died. Little did I know that the day I downloaded this app would top that day. heart 💔 been broke 📉 so many times ⏰ i don’t know 🤔 what to believe 💯 mama 👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩 said 🗣 it’s my fault 😢 it’s my fault 🤦🏻‍♂️i wear my heart ❤️ on my sleeve 💪 i think it’s best 👍🏻 I put my heart ❤️ on ice 🧊
